S3.T6.caption: Table 6. The inference time on Huawei platform
S3.T6.table:
Model Inference time (s) AUC
DCN 0.93 0.76394
KAR + DCN 4.78 0.78663
UserIP-Tuning + DCN 1.21 0.79972
references:
We conclude the offline experimental results for inference time on Huawei in Table 6 . From Table 6, our model, DCN + UserIP-Tuning, achieves 1.21 s/10000 instances, which is 0.28 seconds larger than DCN’s inference time. The baseline KAR’s inference time is much larger than DCN’s, up to 4.78 seconds, which is almost 4 times over UserIP-Tuning’s.
Hence, it is efficient in reasoning capabilities and recommendation performance in industrial scenarios.
In Appendix 3.9, we examine the model performance of UserIP-Tuning on Huawei, which demonstrates the reasoning efficiency.
